Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 66.
_description: The comfortless lover — eleven lines in 6-line stanzas (aabccd) with burden: ‘My luf mornes for me, for me, My luf mornis for me’

CULKk15.Transcription:
Adew deer hertbe man departLat all ȝowr mornyng [be]To
                    luf allonecomfortis nonbot mesing more and moreMy lyf mornes for
                    me for meMy luf mornes for meMyne awin deer hartIt causit my
                    smertAnd grewit my personeSoir I me complene& no
                    ththing…
CULKk15.Editions:
Stevenson,  Joseph. 
             The Scottish Metrical Romance of Lancelot du Lak.
Maitland Club
         48. Edinburgh, 1839: xix.
